title: BELLE VOUS Jumbo Plastic Coated Playing Cards - L37 x W26cm / 14.57 x 10.24 Inches - Full Set Deck of Fun Giant Cards for All Ages - Indoor & Outdoor Family Garden BBQ Party & Casino Poker Games
features: JUMBO PLAYING CARD SET: Included in this set are 52 playing cards with 2 joker cards. The cards are made from high-quality durable cardboard that is laminated with a plastic coating on both sides for added strength. The coating also allows you to easily wipe the cards down clean after hours of enjoyment playing with the cards. This set of cards come with a storage box to keep all the cards safely together when not in use. This box measures L37.5 x W26.5 x H2.5cm (14.76 x 10.43 x 0.98 inches).

54 GIANT PLASTIC CARDS: Our massive heavy-duty card pack includes all the standard playing cards. These are black and red cards in all the 4 suits, hearts, diamond, spades and clubs. 4 2-10 number cards, 4 ace, jack, queen and king face cards of each suit and colour. Plus two jokers to give a total of 54 cards. The complete set allows you to play all your favourite cards games with your friends and family. Each giant card measures L37 x W26cm (14.57 x 10.24 inches) with a thickness of 0.4mm.

INDOOR AND OUTDOOR USE: Use the cards both indoors and outdoor for a variety of family fun activities and party games around the home or at picnics or bbqs. These cards are a fun alternative to traditional playing cards and make ideal novelty party favours, decor wall decorations, funny photo booth props, table placemats and centrepieces. Perfect for throwing casino and Las Vegas themed birthday parties, poker events and mad hatters tea parties.

SUITABLE FOR ALL AGES: These cards are suitable for both boys and girls of all ages. These cards are perfect for teaching children a variety of card games. The oversized cards can be for shuffling, dealing, and playing classic card games such as poker, snap, go-fish, solitaire, blackjack, texas hold ‘em and many others. They can also be used to perform magic tricks and building card houses and stacking large pyramid towers. These cards make an excellent birthday gift or Christmas present.

DESIGNED FOR LIFE: Every product in our collection is built with purpose, blending function and style. Our thoughtfully crafted designs ensure lasting reliability and convenience when needed, ideal for any occasion.
